alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:01PM CDT until June 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Saline County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Haskell, or 7 miles southwest of Benton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Sheridan... White Hall... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Redfield... Traskwood... Tull... Cane Creek... Ironton... Estes... East End... Orion... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... Hensley Island... Pine Bluff Arsenal... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline
